wikitext.*:
[[Image:Rayner Unwin 28 December 1953.png|thumb]]
On [[28 December]] [[1953]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Rayner Unwin]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 420</ref><ref name=TB>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=72170|articlename=Treasures from the Misty Mountains. 2001|dated=|website=TB|accessed=7 February 2012}}</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Arrangements for a visit to [[Allen and Unwin|Allen & Unwin]] at [[Wikipedia:Museum Street|Museum Street]] the [[29 December|following day]].
*'''Publication:''' A reproduction of the postcard appears in ''[[Treasures from the Misty Mountains|Treasures from the Misty Mountains: A Collector's Guide to Tolkien]]'' (p. 126). Selected quotes appear in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: I. Chronology]]'' (p. 420).
